alert.note: Alert for Haakon (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:39PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Haakon County through 330 PM MDT... At 238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Billsburg to 5 miles northeast of Philip. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ottumwa, Billsburg and Grindstone Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
